meta.title: Utah Online School for Public K-12 | UT Connections Academy

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: If you are considering online homeschooling for your family, read about how Utah Connections Academy provides free online education for K-12 students.

a.title: For enrollment help, call us now at 1-800-382-6010

br.p: This website is not compatible with Internet Explorer 8 or below. Please upgrade to the latest version here. This link will open in a new window.

header.h1: K-12 Online Public School in Utah!

div.p: Utah Connections Academy is more than a tuition–free K–12 online public school option available for students throughout Utah. It's also a tight-knit school community offering all the services and resources needed to create a well-rounded student experience.

Ready to go? Start your online
registration now!

br.p: Students throughout Utah are thriving at Utah Connections Academy, a tuition-free online public school. Utah Connections Academy gives students the flexibility to learn at home with a curriculum that meets rigorous state education standards.

div.p: Events are great ways to learn more

div.blockquote: LiveLesson sessions are the best because I get to see my teacher, learn a lot, and meet new friends!
I love Utah Connections Academy because I get to do school at home where my grandma is my learning coach, and I get the chance to do a lot of science experiments.

I became a teacher because I wanted to make a difference in students' lives. I would tell a prospective parent that you can give your child a great education with an online school and you can also keep a much better eye on your child’s progress.

div.h3: Student able to pursue gymnastics dreams
div.p: Antonella Wachterdorff is able to focus on gymnastics thanks to the flexibility of online school
Students visit The National WWII Museum in New Orleans
Students enjoy a day at the Hogle Zoo

ul.li: Utah Connections Academy (UCA) is a tuition-free public online school that serves students in grades K–12 throughout Utah. Utah Connections Academy is accredited by the Northwest Accreditation Commission (NWAC), an accrediting division of Cognia, formerly AdvancED.
Authorized by the Utah State Charter School Board
94% of UCA parents agree that the Connections Academy curriculum is high quality. View our parent survey results.
Download the School Profile for Utah Connections Academy
